nodes.text: An OOM pilot battle droid was stationed on the bridge of General Grievous's Munificent-class star frigate in 22 BBY and participated in the Battle of Bothawui.

During the space battle, this battle droid was ordered by Grievous to increase the power to the forward shields of the Munificent-class star frigate they were on, so that the ship could pass through an asteroid field. The droid then informed the general that they had a clear shot on the Galactic Republic warships. Later, the droid was destroyed along with the rest of Grievous's Separatist fleet when the Republic forces performed an outflanking maneuver using AT-TE walkers. However, Grievous managed to escape in his starfighter.
